- Server IP: mc.stonelegion.com:25565

- Server Discord: [url]https://discord.gg/kBTabCX[/url] - Channel: [warn]#gtnh-2025[/warn]

- Website With Help / More Info: [url]https://stonelegion.com[/url]

- GregTech New Horizons Version: GTNH 2.7.0

On our server we use the following colours:
- §4Red§s§r for Admin
- §aGreen§r for Moderator
- §6Gold§r for "Super" Supporter ($500 USD lifetime or more)
- §dPurple§r for Supporter ($50 USD lifetime or more)
- §bCyan§r for Player (crafted bed and claimed rank)
- §7Grey§r for Newcomer

Due to limitations of the Discord-MC chat bridge bot, everyone chatting from Discord will show up as §bcyan§r in game, but have the proper colour on Discord. Members can use the following commands from Discord:
- !online (shows who's online)
- !list (shows who's online in a different way)

Players have access to a few non-mod related commands, but the important ones are:
- /list (shows online players). You can also see this through TAB
- /kickme (why would you do that?)
- /home, /sethome, /delhome (if we reached the monthly donation goal this month)
- /me MESSAGE (to express your current status)
- /trash_can and trash icon in inv (for donators, others please recycle/trash responsibily)

Moderators/admins have access to:
- whitelist command
- mute/kick/ban

Admins can also use TP, but ONLY for major moderation duties.
